parameter.name: autoscroll
parameter.help: Auto scroll if tree is clipped. Default is false.

parameter.name: closechildren
parameter.help: Close all immediate children when this tree is closed. Default is false.

parameter.name: closesiblings
parameter.help: Flag to close other siblings when this tree is open. Default is false.

parameter.name: focused
parameter.help: If true, this tree is focused. Default is false.

parameter.name: focusoverlay
parameter.help: Meaningful only in root. If focusselect is false and focusoverlay is true, then focus has a visual bracket overlay over the focused tree. Default is false

parameter.name: focusselect
parameter.help: Meaningful only in root. Flag to select a tree on focus. Default is false.

parameter.name: isleaf
parameter.help: If true, this basetree is a leaf node. Default is false.

parameter.name: multiselect
parameter.help: Meaningful only in root. Whether to multiselect items. Default is false.

parameter.name: onfocused
parameter.help: This event gets triggered whenever this tree is focused. The value of the focus (true or false) is sent with this event.

parameter.name: onopen
parameter.help: This event gets triggered whenever this tree is open. The open value of this tree is also sent.

parameter.name: onselected
parameter.help: This event gets triggered whenever this tree is selected. The value of the selection (true or false) is sent with this event. Note the args of this has changed from the previous release.

parameter.name: open
parameter.help: Check to see if this tree is open. Default is false.

parameter.name: recurse
parameter.help: Meaningful only with data replication. If true, it will recursively follow the datapath's children. Default is true.

parameter.name: showroot
parameter.help: Meaningful only in root tree. If false, the root item is invisible and its children are displayed. Default is true.

parameter.name: toggleselected
parameter.help: Meaningful only in root. Flag to toggle selected nodes. Default is false.

parameter.name: xindent
parameter.help: Spacing to indent trees on the x-axis. Default is 10.

parameter.name: yindent
parameter.help: Spacing to indent trees on the y-axis. Default is 20.
